Package net.minecraft.core

Class Vec3i

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.core.Vec3i
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Vec3i>
@Immutable
public class Vec3i extends Object implements Comparable<Vec3i>
Represents an abstract Block Position. This class is designed to have utility methods for working with Block Positions.
